titles.title: Home Mortgage Tax Simplification Act of 2004
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to simplify the deduction for points paid with respect to home mortgages.
Home Mortgage Tax Simplification Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Home Mortgage Tax Simplification Act of 2004 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction in the current taxable year of points paid for the refinancing of a principal residence to the extent that the resulting indebtedness does not exceed the sum of: (1) the amount of debt refinanced; plus (2) the lesser of $10,000 or the points paid.
